name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Brit Continues Hunt For Lost Bitcoin
text:
Synopsis
The cryptocurrency market continues to see significant activity, with notable developments including corporate bitcoin purchases, memecoin speculation, and ongoing legal battles around lost cryptocurrency assets.

Key Insights
- Strategy (MicroStrategy) purchased an additional 7,633 BTC for $742.4 million, bringing their total holdings to 478,740 BTC worth over $46 billion
- A British computer engineer, James Howells, is still pursuing recovery of a hard drive containing an estimated $768 million in lost bitcoin, potentially worth over $1 billion by 2026
- An SEC social media hacker pleaded guilty to posting a fake Bitcoin ETF announcement, which temporarily caused bitcoin's price to surge by over $1,000
- Binance's former CEO CZ criticized the exchange's token listing process, highlighting potential market manipulation risks
- Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports has been actively trading memecoins, with one token (JAILSTOOL) reaching a market cap of over $250 million after being listed on Kraken
